org.dspace.xmlworkflow.storedcomponents

Class XmlWorkflowItemServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dspace.xmlworkflow.storedcomponents.XmlWorkflowItemServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InProgressSubmissionService<XmlWorkflowItem>, WorkflowItemService<XmlWorkflowItem>, XmlWorkflowItemService

    public class XmlWorkflowItemServiceImpl
extends Object
implements XmlWorkflowItemService
    Service implementation for the XmlWorkflowItem object. This class is responsible for all business logic calls for the XmlWorkflowItem object and is autowired by spring. This class should never be accessed directly.
    Author:
    kevinvandevelde at atmire.com
